text: The student will apply history and social science skills to understand Virginiaâ€™s history
subject: History & Social Science
subs: identifying and describing important events and locations throughout the early history of the Commonwealth, including, but not limited to Werowocomoco and the first English colony in North America at Jamestown;
describing how life in various Virginia communities has changed over time; and
identifying local cities or counties on a map of Virginia.
